name: CyberZoo
description:
CyberZoo is a cross-breeding strategy game inspired by CryptoZoo and RealZoo. 

Unlike CryptoZoo, CyberZoo is a real game that is completely free. You can support the development by following me on Twitter and YouTube!

How to Play

  • Buy Eggs with Coins. When you obtain an Egg, its card is added to your Zoo.
  • Eggs can be hatched into random Animals. When you obtain an Animal, its card is added to your Zoo.
  • Based on its rarity, each Animal's card has a Yield Rate, which is how many Coins it generates every 10 seconds. Burn its card to release the Animal from your Zoo and receive the Coins it has accrued.
  • Select two Animal cards to create a new Cross-Breed of the two Animals! Cross-Breeds are special Animals with higher Yield Rates.
  • Earn Coins and expand your Zoo as much as possible!
